categories: Category:Star Wars: The Clone Wars home video releases

nodes.text: Star Wars: The Clone Wars: "A Galaxy Divided"

Star Wars: The Clone Wars: "A Galaxy Divided" is a collection of the first four episodes in Season One of The Clone Wars 3D animated television series. It was released on March 24, 2009. It includes the episodes: "Ambush," "Rising Malevolence," "Shadow of Malevolence" and "Destroy Malevolence." The Wal-Mart edition of this DVD also carried "Downfall of a Droid" as a bonus episode.
A second four-episode compilation entitled Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Clone Commandos was released on September 15, 2009, preceding the arrival of the complete Season One box set on November 3, 2009.
